languages.text: {n}Идира весело крякает.{/n} "Не, вообще ни разу! Вы же наверняка сами слышали истории, как псайкерам пытались запереть их силы насовсем, а они потом с ума сходили или их изнутри на куски разрывало".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира весело крякает.{/n} "Не, вообще ни разу! Вы же наверняка сами слышали истории, как псайкерам пытались запереть их силы насовсем, а они потом с ума сходили или их изнутри на куски разрывало".

languages.text: {n}Idira snorts.{/n} "Oh, it's really, really not! I'm sure you've heard stories about how people tried to lock psykers' abilities away for good, and how those psykers would then eventually go insane and explode into little pieces."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира весело крякает.{/n} "Не, вообще ни разу! Вы же наверняка сами слышали истории, как псайкерам пытались запереть их силы насовсем, а они потом с ума сходили или их изнутри на куски разрывало".

{n}Idira snorts.{/n} "Oh, it's really, really not! I'm sure you've heard stories about how people tried to lock psykers' abilities away for good, and how those psykers would then eventually go insane and explode into little pieces."

{n}Idira snorts.{/n} "Oh, it's really, really not! I'm sure you've heard stories about how people tried to lock psykers' abilities away for good, and how those psykers would then eventually go insane and explode into little pieces."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉哼了一声。{/n}“是啊，没错，一点都不安全！我相信你肯定听说过这样的故事，人类试图彻底压抑灵能者的能力，而这些灵能者到最后都会发疯，砰地一声炸成肉泥。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts.{/n} "Oh, it's really, really not! I'm sure you've heard stories about how people tried to lock psykers' abilities away for good, and how those psykers would then eventually go insane and explode into little pieces."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉哼了一声。{/n}“是啊，没错，一点都不安全！我相信你肯定听说过这样的故事，人类试图彻底压抑灵能者的能力，而这些灵能者到最后都会发疯，砰地一声炸成肉泥。”

languages.text: {n}Idira se ríe.{/n} «¡Oh, no, en absoluto! Seguro que ha oído historias sobre los intentos de sellar las capacidades psíquicas: todos acaban en locura y en una explosión cruenta».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts.{/n} "Oh, it's really, really not! I'm sure you've heard stories about how people tried to lock psykers' abilities away for good, and how those psykers would then eventually go insane and explode into little pieces."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se ríe.{/n} «¡Oh, no, en absoluto! Seguro que ha oído historias sobre los intentos de sellar las capacidades psíquicas: todos acaban en locura y en una explosión cruenta».

languages.text: {n}Idira schnaubt auf.{/n} "Oh nein, wirklich nicht! Ihr habt bestimmt Geschichten gehört, dass die Leute versucht haben, die Fähigkeiten von Psionikern vollständig wegzusperren. Und dass diese Psioniker dann irgendwann den Verstand verloren haben und explodiert sind."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts.{/n} "Oh, it's really, really not! I'm sure you've heard stories about how people tried to lock psykers' abilities away for good, and how those psykers would then eventually go insane and explode into little pieces."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira schnaubt auf.{/n} "Oh nein, wirklich nicht! Ihr habt bestimmt Geschichten gehört, dass die Leute versucht haben, die Fähigkeiten von Psionikern vollständig wegzusperren. Und dass diese Psioniker dann irgendwann den Verstand verloren haben und sind explodiert sind."

languages.text: {n}イディラはフンと鼻を鳴らす。{/n}「それは絶対に違うわ！異能者たちの能力を永久に封じ込めようとした人たちがいて、そのせいで異能者たちが最後には発狂して粉々に爆発してしまった話、聞いたことがあるでしょう？」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts.{/n} "Oh, it's really, really not! I'm sure you've heard stories about how people tried to lock psykers' abilities away for good, and how those psykers would then eventually go insane and explode into little pieces."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラはフンと鼻を鳴らす。{/n}「それは絶対に違うわ！異能者たちの能力を永久に封じ込めようとした人たちがいて、そのせいで異能者たちが最後には発狂して粉々に爆発してしまった話、聞いたことがあるでしょう？」

languages.text: {n}Idira s'étrangle.{/n} « Oh, non, pas le moins du monde ! Je suis sûre que vous avez déjà entendu des histoires sur les psykers qui tentent de refouler définitivement leurs pouvoirs, et comment ils basculent dans la folie avant d'éclater en morceaux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts.{/n} "Oh, it's really, really not! I'm sure you've heard stories about how people tried to lock psykers' abilities away for good, and how those psykers would then eventually go insane and explode into little pieces."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira s'étrangle.{/n} « Oh, non, pas le moins du monde ! Je suis sûre que vous avez déjà entendu des histoires sur les psykers qui tentent de refouler définitivement leurs pouvoirs, et comment ils basculent dans la folie avant d'éclater en morceaux. »

languages.text: {n}İdira homurdanıyor.{/n} "Eh, değil zaten. Hem de hiç! İnsanların ruhsezerlerin kabiliyetlerine zincir vurmak istediği ve o ruhsezerlerin delirdiği ve patlayıp paramparça olduğu hikâyeleri duymuşsundur."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts.{/n} "Oh, it's really, really not! I'm sure you've heard stories about how people tried to lock psykers' abilities away for good, and how those psykers would then eventually go insane and explode into little pieces."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira homurdanıyor.{/n} "Eh, değil zaten. Hem de hiç! İnsanların ruhsezerlerin kabiliyetlerine zincir vurmak istediği ve o ruhsezerlerin delirip küçük parçalar hâlinde patladığı hikâyeleri duymuşsundur."
